text: 1. Lower-division requirements (65 units minimum): ENGR 001-I, CS 010A, CS 010B, CS 010C, CS 061, CS 011/MATH 011, MATH 009A, MATH 009B, MATH 009C, MATH 010A, Math 031 or EE 020B, PHYS 040A, PHYS 040B, PHYS 040C, plus 8 additional engineering units (4 depth, 4 breadth). 2. Upper-division requirements (79 units minimum): ENGR 101-I, CS 100, CS 141, CS 150, CS 152, CS 153, CS 161, CS 179 (E-Z), CS 120A/EE 120A, CS 111, ENGR 180W, STAT 155, plus 32 units technical electives (at least 16 CS units).
